prod_desc.heading: Why buy Defunc True Sport TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation
features: Premium and stylish looks makes it more attractive and very impressive
With microphones great for making phone calls for several reasons
Bluetooth v5.2 provides high efficiency and high speed connection
12mm Optimised Driver for deeper bass, crisp clear and seamless sound
sub_features: Do you want to hear great sound with great sound quality? Get the Defunc True Sport TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation. Equipped with optimized 12mm drivers, you'll feel like you're right in the middle of the action every time a bullet or shell hits your ear. Featuring the world's only MultiTip design based on consumer insights, these earbuds feature sensitive touch controls and are IPX5 water and sweat resistant with nano-coating. Fast charging and a total of 30 hours of playtime make listening comfortable and seamless. The Defunc True Sport TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation have a wide range of features to make listening more comfortable and enjoyable to suit your particular listening style.

The Defunc True Sport TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation provide a long-lasting and comfortable listening experience that is perfect for everyday use. These earbuds feature the world's only in-house developed multi-chip design based on consumer insights for long-lasting comfort and a secure fit. You can find your perfect fit with three silicone ear tip sizes. It offers a true wireless experience with Bluetooth v5.2 connectivity that instantly pairs with your smartphone as soon as you open the charging case lid. So, grab this Defunc True Sport TWS Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation, online!

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
